buildup.text: In Christian art, blue belonged to the Virgin Mary. Red belonged to Christ's sacrifice.

discovery.text: These color codes weren't artistic choices. They were theological rules enforced by the church.

climax.text: Hindu art assigns specific colors to deities: blue for Vishnu, red for Lakshmi, yellow for Ganesh.
